title: Default values not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When trying to modify a parameter in the Enter Parameters dialog, all values were empty instead of showing the default values. This made it necessary to input all values again.
OB: In the Enter Parameters dialog, all values were empty, requiring the user to input all values again.
EB: When clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the Enter Parameters dialog should display the default values in the value box, allowing the user to modify the parameter they want to change.
SR:
1. Preview the report
2. Click the Show Report Parameters button
3. Verify that the Enter Parameters dialog shows the default values for each parameter
4. Modify the desired parameter and confirm that the change is reflected in the report
